name: Sinatra auth github
body:
# Sinatra Auth GitHub

We :heart: [Sinatra](http://sinatrarb.com) at GitHub for building small applications that do something well.  A lot of times we want to enable those apps to allow GitHubbers to login and see what we've built.  We use organizations and GitHub OAuth](http://developer.github.com/v3/oauth/) to make this happen.  This way we can ensure that our coworkers can see the data, but other random GitHub users.

## Features

* authenticate a user against GitHub's OAuth service
* provide an easy way to make API requests for the authenticated user
* optionally restrict users to a specific GitHub organization
* optionally restrict users to a specific GitHub team

## Authors and Contributors
@atmos, @defunkt, and @sr.

## Support or Contact
Having trouble with it? Open [an issue](https://github.com/atmos/sinatra_auth_github/issues/new).
tagline: simple sinatra extension to authenticate users against github oauth
